review: I wanted this to mirror my phone or PC. After many failed attempts I finally got it to work with the PC enough to watch a movie, it would not connect again the next day. After reset and reboot etc. I got it to mirror the phone once.I have Amazon prime and have yet to find an included movie/show that I want to watch, everything is $3 and up. It is packed with a lot of apps like Netflix, IHeartRadio, Hulu and others but I also have those apps on my Blu-Ray player and my Tivo.The stick it so slow to connect to anything, It would take a full minute or two transition from the home screen to the app.  I only got it to connect to iHeartRadio once.
author: Ronald Ragan "Ron"

review: When we received the Amazon fire tv stick it was packaged nicely.  We opened it and found that it did include all the connections we needed for it to work with our tv. The applications on it are all easy to find and use. We would highly recommend this product because it is easy to use, is small in size, and allows us to get more use from our Amazon prime membership.
